sentence: It's  also  saying  one  of  its  own  soldiers  was  killed  in  the  northern  Gaza  strip  on  Monday  -  Israel’s  Kan  News  reports  he  died  in  the  operation  at  the  hospital.
It's  also  saying  one  of  its  own  soldiers  was  killed  in  the  northern  Gaza  strip  on  Monday  -  Israel’s  Kan  News  reports  he  died  in  the  operation  at  the  hospital.
The  IDF  also  says  Hamas's  head  of  internal  security  operations  Faiq  al-Mabhouh  was  killed  during  an  exchange  of  gun  fire  during  the  operation.
